Title: Web3 Full-Stack Development Intern
Description: Company AI Seer aiseer.co Designation Web3 Full-Stack Development Intern Date Listed 28 Nov 2025 Job Type Entry Level / Junior Executive Intern/TS Job Period Immediate Start, For At Least 3 Months Profession Engineering Industry Artificial Intelligence / Smart Automation Location Name Ayer Rajah Crescent, Block 79, Singapore Address 79 Ayer Rajah Crescent, Block 79, Singapore 139955 Map Allowance / Remuneration $1,000 - 1,800 monthly Company Profile Web3 Full-Stack Developer Intern Full Time, Mid-Level, Hybrid About AI Seer AI Seer is a truth-seeking company, founded in December 2019, dedicated to building tools that foster transparent, source-backed conversations and uncover hidden truths in our noisy physical and digital world. Our mission is to make truth discoverable and reliable by empowering people to fact-check, uncover hidden truths, and make informed decisions. ArAIstotle, our truth-seeking agent, launched on Virtuals with 658% oversubscription and 16,083 participants to pioneer crypto’s truth layer. We’ve developed innovations at the frontier of AI and truth technologies, including the Multi-Spectral Reality Detector (MSRD), an AI-powered, contactless deception detector, and Facticity AI, a real-time fact-checking platform. Building on these, we’re pioneering the next frontier: a Virtual Reality Detector agent that combines the strengths of both systems to push the boundaries of truth-seeking across centralized, decentralized, and immersive worlds. AI Seer is backed by investor Tim Draper and has been recognized as one of TIME’s Best Inventions 2024 and Top 5 Finalist at the SuperAI Genesis Startup Competition, milestones that reflect our commitment to innovation and impact. We believe trust and accountability are the cornerstones of the digital age. In a world where everyone searches for answers online, who is verifying them for you? Why Join Us? At AI Seer, you’ll help shape the future of truth technologies at the cutting edge of AI, Web3 and immersive innovation. Your ideas will make a real impact as we work to uncover hidden truths and restore trust in a noisy world. Together we are building more than products. We are creating a culture of curiosity, creativity and progress. Job Description About the Role We’re looking for a Web3 Full-Stack Developer Intern who’s curious, fast-learning, and comfortable working across both software and blockchain systems. You’ll support our engineering team in building real Web3 features used across our products, contribute to smart contract and backend development, and help integrate these systems with our AI-driven truth infrastructure. In this role, you will: Design, build, and deploy Python-based microservices (Flask, FastAPI, AWS Lambda) that aggregate data from Web3 APIs. Write, test, and deploy Solidity smart contracts for tokens, governance, and automation. Develop Web3-enabled frontends with React/Next.js and TypeScript that integrate wallets, contracts, and APIs. Implement wallet connectivity (WalletConnect, MetaMask), transaction signing, and blockchain event listening. Build automated airdrop systems with eligibility validation, anti-bot protection, and fraud prevention. Embed robust security checks into every stage of the stack, from backend to smart contracts to frontend. Collaborate with AI engineers to align Web3 systems with AI safety and truth-focused outputs. Monitor and optimize performance, scalability, and cost efficiency across services. Stay updated on Web3 trends, emerging protocols, and new blockchain technologies to propose innovative solutions. Integrate dApps and mini apps with blockchain networks (e.g., Base), wallets (e.g., MetaMask, World App, WalletConnect), and decentralized protocols (e.g., IPFS, The Graph). You might thrive in this role, if you have: Strong programming fundamentals and experience building software projects (school, personal, or previous internships). Basic familiarity with Python (Flask/FastAPI optional). Interest or early experience with React/Next.js and TypeScript. Curiosity about Solidity and smart contract development (Hardhat/Foundry exposure is a plus). Some understanding of Ethereum, EVM chains, or token standards (ERC-20, ERC-721, etc). Exposure to ethers.js/web3.js/wagmi or willingness to learn them quickly. Familiarity with REST APIs and basic backend concepts. A mindset for clean code, security awareness and testability. Interest in AI and trust technologies. It will be a bonus, if you have: Experience contributing to AI-safety-aligned or trust-infrastructure projects. Knowledge of DeFi protocols, on-chain analytics, or cross-chain solutions. Familiarity with decentralized identity frameworks (DIDs, verifiable credentials, soulbound tokens). Experience deploying dApps on decentralized hosting (IPFS, Arweave). Application Instructions Please apply for this position by submitting your CV to enquiries@aiseer.co Kindly note that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. Apply for this position
